scripts.start: export $(cat .env | xargs) && export REACT_APP_MODULE_ADDR=0x$(npx aptos config show-profiles --profile=$REACT_APP_NETWORK | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p') && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.move:compile: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move compile --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles --profile=$REACT_APP_NETWORK | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p')
scripts.move:test: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move test --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles --profile=$REACT_APP_NETWORK | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p')
scripts.move:publish: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move publish --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles --profile=$REACT_APP_NETWORK | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p') --profile=$REACT_APP_NETWORK
